pages.title: Fluid Injector
pages.text: The Fluid Injector allow you to insert existing fluid fuels into the Fluidizer to mix them and create a new fuel.

pages.usage.text: $(l)Mandatory:$() see $(l:bigreactors:fluidizer/operational_mode)operational mode$(/l)$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() no
